Articles.Content:
This was a drawing I made using Paint Tool SAI by basing it off a Screenshot I took, I tried to Remake the screenshot but I ended up making it look a lot arty looking. Hope you guys like it.

http://sickle2596.Deviantart.com For more art.

Ive never used sai, personally im a photoshop guy. The image looks good, however I would try to get more deatil into it; for example the ship you can make out the larger parts such as the wings however you should try to have more micro details (somthing im trying to work on too). Other than that i would say that the suns a bit too red but over all a good picture!
Hey thanks for the Feedback, the amount of detail was intended, it was meant to look blurry, as for the sun, I tried to mimic a Lens Flare. The key-word there being "tried".
Ah i see; and lens flares aren't too easy to do manually so good job on that!
Cheers, I made the lens flare second (after background) and then editing caused it to look like a Supernova. I just left it cause I liked the look of it.
